entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable new xUnit analyzers #75093
  • Possibly unexpected error when a ref field is passed as an argument #75082
  • Pattern matching an enum using an enum value following by using "with expression" on a record causes a compilation error #75074
  • Semantic snippets: Inline statement snippets are not present if completion session is not triggered explicitly #75072

Closed

  • Stack overflow when compiling incorrectly formed attribute argument string #74677
    17.13
  • Incorrect System.Reflection.*Attributes checks in some parts of the code #16929
    Backlog
  • API: Analyzer redirecting #74989
  • Japanese Translation Issues in “Naming style" Sample. #75051
  • Incorrect nullability analysis #75017
  • API: `Conversion.IsSpan` #74738
  • constant string allow conversions #74369
  • Assert failure when building runtime: Stack not empty during emit. #75034
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35311.136 #75064

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude identifiers in attributes from identifier map #75100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberNameAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [TEST] Test our publishing correctness CI task #75098
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2537263 #75097
    auto-merge
  • Remove some obsolete build properties #75096
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Issue 74872 #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move some emit tests from Emit2 to Emit3 to avoid hitting UserString heap limit #75091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #75090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Test and document Span breaking changes #75079
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge `main` into `features/FirstClassSpan` #75077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Disallow ref assignment to ternary or another ref assignment #75076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Keep try syntax in async exception rewriting #75070
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Adjust an assert in EmitArgument #75067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Adjust IsMetadataVirtual assertion in MethodToClassRewriter #75066
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Include initial filter node when searching for nodes to order modifiers #75092
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • BindAttributeCore - use proper binder to avoid an attribute binding cycle #75060
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove buggy IsPublic method from TypeAttributesExtensions #75081
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Log messages for Test Results #75084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localize 17.12 branch #75088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove additional Gitter link #75086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75087
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lock translation of strings used to demonstrate identifier naming styles #75065
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75080
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix stack adjustment when emitting stackalloc #75042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #75069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move build and test to an newer Ubuntu image with longer support #74881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.12
  • Enable NuGet audit #75049
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to new VMR control set #75056
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Add analyzer redirecting API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • docs: Fix "Augment user code" example #75041
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged
